attributes.action: force the NMC to protect the nurses proved innocent from the press
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The NMC publishes information about upcoming 'fitness to practice' cases on their website, with details about when it is to be held and where. The court is an open court and they also contact the registrants local newspaper so they can write about it, 'in the interest of public safety'.

For those nurses who have been proved innocent and cleared of charges the NMC should not allow the press to write about them, or any other registrant until they have been proved guilty.

Protect the innocent.
